settings.heading: Table & Twine Raleigh Meal Kit Subscriptions
settings.text2: With a Raleigh chef-prepared dinner subscription, you bring the bold flavors of a five-star eatery to your very own dinner table.

settings.title: Customized Subscription
settings.text: Personalize your Raleigh dinner meal kit subscription based on your family size and how many meals you want each week. Add à la carte items like appetizers and desserts to your meal kit too.

settings.title: Chef-Inspired Recipes
settings.text: Dinner should never be bland and boring. That’s why our talented chefs develop new, exciting recipes each week.

settings.title: Dinnertime Discounts
settings.text: When you subscribe to Table & Twine, you receive savory savings on each meal. As a result, you’ll enjoy restaurant-quality dinners for a fraction of the price.

settings.title: Free Delivery
settings.text: With a dinner meal kit subscription in Raleigh, we’ll ship pre-prepared ingredients to your door for free. Or, you can opt to pick up your meal kit at our local kitchen.

settings.title: Adjust Your Subscription
settings.text: Up until your order is processed on Sunday morning, you can amend your meal kit to better suit your needs.

settings.title: Substitute Meals
settings.text: Are you craving pizza instead of pasta? With Table & Twine, you can always swap out weekly meals before your order processes.

settings.title: Personalized Recommendations
settings.text: Each week, our talented chefs make menu recommendations based on your preferences. You can either confirm these selections or make your own.

settings.title: Pause Your Subscription
settings.text: If you’re headed out of town, you can easily pause your subscription. Come back whenever is best for you.

All Table & Twine customers can select delicious and convenient meals from chef-curated menus. However, with a dinner meal kit subscription in Raleigh, you’ll receive big discounts on rotating entrées and bistro items. You’ll also benefit from free shipping. Even better, our dinner subscription is flexible. Unlike our competitors, we let customers personalize their meal kit to meet their needs – not ours.

settings.title: More Meals
settings.text: Are you hosting out-of-town relatives for the week? No problem. With a dinner meal subscription kit in Raleigh, you can easily add chef-prepared meals while still receiving discounts.

settings.title: No Renewals
settings.text: Just because you ordered appetizers this week doesn’t mean you have to next week. With Table & Twine, we never strongarm you into ordering à la carte items.

settings.title: Delectable Pairings
settings.text: The best way to finish a chef-prepared dinner is with a decadent dessert. Order sweet treats, appetizers, cocktail mixes, and other à la carte pairings to complete your meal.

settings.title: Convenient Delivery
settings.text: Even if you add à la carte selections to your cart, you’ll still enjoy free, flexible shipping.

settings.section_heading: Adding A La Carte Items to Your Order

settings.title: What’s included in my Raleigh chef-prepared dinners subscription?
settings.text: Your dinner meal kit will include everything you need to prepare a chef-inspired meal in 15 minutes or less.

settings.title: Do I get to choose the meals I want or are they selected for me?
settings.text: Each week, our talented chefs will make meal suggestions based on your preferences. You can accept their selections. Or, you can make your own.

settings.title: Will I benefit from a dinner meal prep subscription in Raleigh?
settings.text: Absolutely! Our chefs handle the more technical aspects of cooking, from julienning to roasting, so you don’t have to. When you receive your dinner meal kit, just scan the QR code on your meal for easy-to-follow heating instructions and get to cooking! You’ll have a decadent meal in 15 minutes or less.

settings.title: What if I want to order breakfast items?
settings.text: If you need something quick and delicious each morning, Table & Twine can help. Order an egg sandwich, oat bowl, smoothie, or other à la carte breakfast items.

settings.title: Can I change my order?
settings.text: Up until your order is processed on Sunday morning, you can make modifications.

settings.section_heading: Raleigh Dinner Meal Kit Subscription FAQs
